message: Take it or leave it! We can negotiate later if you want more.
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not giving up that much. I'll think of a new offer.
Meet me in the middle, but a bit closer to my end.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied. Can we meet in the middle now?
I'm not giving up that much more. I'll try to get a better deal.
Getting closer to the middle, but I'm still holding out for a better deal.
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
You're just repeating the same offer. I'm not buying it.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
